WWL Spotlight: Bonnabel High School Teacher Celebrates 50 Years
To stream WWL TV on your phone, you need the WWL TV app.
Download the WWL TV app
After 50 years in the classroom, a Bonnabel High teacher is being celebrated with weekly surprises that are now drawing attention beyond the school.
